title: Matter of life and death
creator_credit: Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group and Trevor Lunn
brief_description: Alan Grossbard, an education officer with the State Electricity Commission in Victoria, talks about some of the features of electricity and the potentially dangerous results if it is misused.
